professional_summary: Experienced SharePoint Administrator/Developer with expertise in SharePoint Technologies, ASP.NET, C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SQL Server. Proven track record in web development, database management, and project management across various organizations.

key_responsibilities: Designed and implemented custom and SPD workflows; created navigation for site collections and content types.
Managed SharePoint Security and created Team Sites and Custom SharePoint Lists.
Provided support for SharePoint Portal Server and Windows SharePoint Services-based intranet sites.
Designed websites and created custom web parts including Data View Web Part
Provided technical support to end-users and resolved day-to-day issues regarding SharePoint usage.
Created custom forms using InfoPath 2007 and published them to SharePoint Form Library.
Developed windows applications linked to SQL databases.

additional_information.achievements: Expertise in custom web parts development and successful implementation of various SharePoint projects.
